item.description:
Join the AMC hike in Truro-- Bearberry Hill.  Sand path w 360 ocean view ending at Longnook Bch. Rte 6 to Pamet Rd, R off ramp, L on S Pamet Rd to beach pkg lot at end. Meet at 9:45 for 10:00 start, 2 hrs.

(Ballston Beach was the site of the first shark attack in Massachusetts since 1936 this summer. See "Truro to keep Ballston Beach open")

Aerial view of Bearberry Hill hiking area at HikingCapeCod.com

This is an AMC hike, led by Pat Sarantis. (For those who may not be aware, the AMC is the Appalachian Mountain Club.)

Swimming is optional.

Breakfast at 8:30 if you are able to join us at Fairway Restaurant & Pizzeria 4295 State Hwy, Eastham, MA  (State Road is Route 6)

Registration is not required (with the AMC) for this hike. You do not have to be a member of the AMC to attend. For more info on the AMC, visit Outdoors.org. A general rule with AMC hikes is that dogs are not allowed.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Brave the Great White with the Thursday Hiking Club
